actr.model

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • actr.model.Chunk

  • public class Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
    Chunks of declarative knowledge represented as pairings of slots and slot values.

    Unlike the classic ACT-R architecture, this implementation does not use chunk types to specify the type of each chunk via a special isa slot. Instead, the model can assign a slot value to any slot name (including using isa in the traditional way, thus ensuring compatibility with older models).

    Author:
    Dario Salvucci
